setTimeout(() => {
  console.log("ACCOUNT ICON FIX");
  try {
    if (digitalData?.user?.[0]?.profile?.[0]?.attributes?.isLoggedIn) {
      const button = document.querySelector('.account-icon-link.account-login-button');

      if (button) {
        const newButton = button.cloneNode(true);
        button.parentNode.replaceChild(newButton, button);
        
        // Add a new 'click' event listener that stops other listeners
        newButton.addEventListener('click', (event) => {
          event.stopImmediatePropagation(); // Prevent any other click handlers from executing
          window.location.href = '/account/';
        });
      } else {
        console.warn('Button not found: .account-icon-link.account-login-button');
      }
    }
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('An error occurred while adding the click event listener:', error);
  }
}, 1000);

<script src="/dist/js/interrupter-banner.bundle.174bb56a6a.js"></script>
<div id="react_0HNDCRKC52KIL"><section class="interrupter-banner-container hidden"><div class="desktop-collapsed-banner-container" data-testid="desktop-collapsed-banner-container"><div class="collapsed-banner-content" data-testid="collapsed-banner-content"><button aria-label="Open Modal" class="dsButton_1r2-k dsButtonPrimary_wRrCE dsButtonLg_1Sq4t collapsed-banner-button" data-testid="collapsed-banner-button" id="collapsed-banner-interrupter-trigger-button" type="button"><div><div><strong>Save 10%</strong> off full-price items*</div></div></button></div><button class="dsButtonTransparent_6ijzy  interrupter-banner-close-button" data-testid="banner-close-button" id="collapsed-banner-close-button" type="button"><svg data-testid="svg-icon" focusable="false" role="img" class="icon svg-icon-close" aria-label="Close Banner"><use xlink:href="#svg-icon-close"></use></svg></button></div></section></div><script>
    (function (triggerType, cssSelector, experimentId) {

        let defaultMovedToBanner = localStorage.getItem('EmailSmsMovedToBanner') > 0;
        let cache = null;

        async function buildInterrupterAsync() {
            if (cache === null) {
                try {
                    const isKids = window.digitalData.page.attributes.navState.toLowerCase() === "cratekids";
                    const response = await fetch(`/api/interrupter/build?experimentId=${experimentId}&isKids=${isKids}`, { credentials: 'same-origin' });
                    cache = await response.json();
                    sessionStorage.setItem('interrupterData', JSON.stringify(cache));
                    return cache;
                } catch (e) {
                    console.error(e)
                }
            }
        }

        async function handleOnClick(isClicked, isAutoTrigger) {
            const response = await buildInterrupterAsync();
            
            const interrupterEvent = new CustomEvent('build-interrupter', { detail: response });
            const interrupterBannerEvent = new CustomEvent('build-interrupter-banner', { detail: response });

            setTimeout(document.dispatchEvent(interrupterBannerEvent));

            if (isClicked || (!response?.isMobile && isAutoTrigger)) {
                setTimeout(document.dispatchEvent(interrupterEvent));
            }
        }

        function setupEventTrigger() {
            document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", () => {

                const triggerElement = document.querySelector(cssSelector);
                if (!(triggerElement)) {
                    throw new Error(`Interrupter trigger element with CSS selector: "${cssSelector}" not found...`);
                }
                
                triggerElement.addEventListener('click', (event) => {
                    handleOnClick(true, false);
                });

                //handle dynamically added react mobile banner's click event
                const bannerContainer = document.querySelector('.interrupter-banner-container');
                if (!!bannerContainer) {
                    bannerContainer.addEventListener('click', function(event) {
                        if (event.target.classList.contains('mobile-collapsed-banner-button') || event.target.classList.contains('medium-banner-button')) {
                            handleOnClick(true, false);
                        }
                    });
                }
            });
        }

        function setupAutoTrigger() {    
            document.addEventListener("InterrupterInitialized", () => {
                handleOnClick(false, !defaultMovedToBanner ? true : false);
            });
        }

        switch (triggerType) {
            default:
                setupEventTrigger();
                break;

            case 'autotrigger':
                setupAutoTrigger();
                break;
        }

    })('autotrigger', '', '');
</script>



    <div id="main-body-container" aria-hidden="true" data-ds-modal-open="true" data-popup-open="">
<script>
    // *Fix for iphone back button issue HWS-10192
    var addTabIndex = function (elementId) {
        var element = document.getElementById(elementId);
        element.tabIndex = -1;
        element.focus();  // Programmatically set focus to the element
    };

    var removeTabIndex = function (elementId) {
        setTimeout(function () {
            var element = document.getElementById(elementId);
            if (element) {
                element.removeAttribute("tabindex");
            }
        }, 50);
    };
</script>
  
<div class="skip-main-link">
    <a href="#main" id="skip-to-main" onclick="addTabIndex('main')">Skip to Main Content</a>
    <a href="#footer" id="skip-to-footer" onclick="addTabIndex('footer')">Skip to Footer</a>
</div>

    </script>

<script>
    var standalone = window.navigator.standalone,
        userAgent = window.navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase(),
        safari = /safari/.test( userAgent ),
        ios = /iphone|ipod|ipad/.test( userAgent );

if( ios && document.querySelectorAll('.message-content .ipad').length > 1) {

    if ( !standalone && safari ) {
        document.querySelectorAll('.message-content .desktop').forEach(item => item.remove());
    }

} else {

    document.querySelectorAll('.message-content .ipad').forEach(item => item.remove());

};
</script>

        {"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Organization","url":"https://www.crateandbarrel.com","name":"Crate and Barrel","logo":"https://images.crateandbarrel.com/is/image/Crate/Crate_PWA-Splashv02?fmt=png&wid=192","alternateName":"Crate and Kids","sameAs":["https://www.facebook.com/crateandbarrel","https://www.pinterest.com/crateandbarrel/","https://www.instagram.com/crateandbarrel/","https://www.tiktok.com/@crateandbarrel","https://www.youtube.com/crateandbarrel/","https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crate_%26_Barrel"],"contactPoint":[{"@type":"ContactPoint","telephone":"+1-800-967-6696","contactType":"customer service"}]}

<script>
    document.body.addEventListener("GladlyInitiated", () => {
        const set = (keyName, keyValue) => {
            const data = {
                value: keyValue // store the value within this object
            }
    
            // store data in SessionStorage 
            sessionStorage.setItem(keyName, JSON.stringify(data));
        };
    
        const get = (keyName) => {
            const data = sessionStorage.getItem(keyName);
            if (!data) { // if no value exists associated with the key, return null
                return null;
            }
            const item = JSON.parse(data);
            return item.value;
        };
    
        if (get('isGladlyUserSet') === 'true') {
            return;
        }
        if (Crate.Utilities.Cookies.getCookie("Account") !== 'true') {
            return; //Don't call to get account if we're not logged in.
        }
    
        const options = {
            method: 'POST',
            body: JSON.stringify({id:1}),
            headers: {
                'Accept': 'application/json',
                'Content-Type': 'application/json'
            }
        }
    
        fetch('/account/login/getUser', options)
            .then(response => response.json())
            .then(data => {
                const timer = setInterval(() => {
                    if (!window.Gladly?.setUser) {
                        return;
                    }
                    if (data.name?.trim() && data.email) {
                        window.Gladly?.setUser(data);
                        set('isGladlyUserSet', 'true');
                    } 
                    clearInterval(timer);
                }, 500);
            });
    });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
const countryLink = document.querySelector("#countryLink") ? document.querySelector("#countryLink") : null;
const countrySelect = document.querySelector("#countrySelect") ?
document.querySelector("#countrySelect") : null;


countrySelect.addEventListener("input", () => {
  const selectedCountryName =
    countrySelect.options[countrySelect.selectedIndex].label;
  const selectedCountryHref = countrySelect.value;
  const linkText = `Continue to ${selectedCountryName} site`;

  countryLink.innerHTML = linkText;
  countryLink.href = selectedCountryHref;

  if (selectedCountryName.toLowerCase() == "united states") {
    countryLink.classList.add("usa");
    countryLink.classList.remove("not-usa");
  } else {
    countryLink.classList.remove("usa");
    countryLink.classList.add("not-usa");
  }
});

function setCookie() {
  Crate.Services.HttpService.get("/GeoLocationPopup/SetGeoLocationPopupCookie")
    .then(function (response) {
      console.log("Geo Location Cookie Set");
    })
    .catch(function (error) {
      console.log(error);
    });
    removeListeners();
}

function handleClose() {
        setCookie();
	Crate.React.Actions.PopupActions.toggleOpen(false);
}

countryLink.addEventListener("click", function (event) {
  if (countryLink.classList.contains("not-usa")) {
    setCookie();
  } else {
    event.preventDefault();
    handleClose(); 
  }
});

const geoLocationContainer = document.querySelector(".popup-content .geo-location-popup-container");
const closeBtn = document.querySelector(".button.popup-close");

if (geoLocationContainer) {
  closeBtn.addEventListener("click", setCookie);
}

function removeListeners() {
  closeBtn.removeEventListener("click", setCookie);
}
	</script>
  </div>
</div>

                    
</div></div></section></div>

<script>
    //lazy load images
    var isMobile = "false";
    var lazyLoadRootMarginDesktop = "800px 800px";
    var lazyLoadRootMarginMobile = "800px 800px";
    var lazyLoadRootMargin = isMobile ? lazyLoadRootMarginMobile : lazyLoadRootMarginDesktop;
    Crate.Services.LazyLoadService.watch(document.querySelectorAll("img.lazyload"), lazyLoadRootMargin);
    Crate.Services.LazyLoadService.watch(document.querySelectorAll("img[data-lazy-load]"), lazyLoadRootMargin);
</script>

Order online.\\r\\n","headline":"Banquettes","searchTerms":["banquette"],"content":"<h2>What is a Banquette Bench?</h2>\\r\\n<p>A banquette is a long dining bench that accommodates multiple people. While some models have traditional straight construction, others are built at right angles to fit snugly into corners. Often used in breakfast nooks, banquette benches lend a cozy, intimate feel to the dining area. To create a breakfast nook, start with a corner banquette pushed against the wall; you can also use two straight banquettes positioned at a right angle. Then, add a <a href=\'/small-dining-tables\'>small dining table</a> to fill the area created by the benches. If you often host large groups, include a few chairs on the other two sides of the table to create extra places. Round out the look with table linens and dinnerware coordinated to the rest of your decor. You can even create a breakfast nook in a smaller room with a kitchen table and short, straight banquette instead of a corner one. Celebrate your new eating area with a peaceful cup of coffee or by hosting <a href=\'/ideas-and-advice/brunch-ideas\'>brunch</a>.</p>\\r\\n\\r\\n<h2>Banquette Benches for Comfortable Dining</h2>\\r\\n<p>Whether you\'re furnishing a breakfast nook in the kitchen or looking for child-friendly seating in the dining room, consider a banquette. If you have a small eat-in kitchen area, these benches allow the table to be pushed closer to the wall when not in use—creating more floor space for cooking and gathering. In the dining room, consider replacing the dining chairs on one side of the table with a banquette. Traditional <a href=\'/wood-dining-chairs\'>wood chairs</a> on the opposite side complement the aesthetic and offer guests a different seating option. Sandy-hued upholstery contrasts legs in a dark stain, while black and grey fabric options emphasize modern style. Prefer a more rustic approach? Consider a backless wood dining bench alongside a table in a similar stain. For more casual vibes, forgo chairs altogether and add a bench on either side of the table. Lounge marries modern style with built-to-last durability. An excellent choice for high-traffic rooms, the Lounge sofa offers the ultimate in comfort with extra-deep, low seats and supersoft back cushions that invite curling up and sinking in. Slim, modern track arms lighten the look and maximize sitting space, making Lounge the perfect place to relax.FSC®-certified hardwood from responsibly managed forests. Frame is benchmade with hardwood kiln-dried to prevent warping. Best-of-both-worlds comfort: Seat cushions are supportive plant-based polyfoam wrapped in a soft, sink-in fiber and feather-down blend. Fiber-down back cushions provide a soft feel. Cushions are wrapped in a special ticking fabric that keeps feathers in place while maintaining shape and comfort over time. ","headline":"Ivory Furniture","searchTerms":["Ivory Furniture"],"content":"<h2>Bring a Classic Feel to Your Home with Ivory Furniture</h2>\\r\\n<p>Give your home a touch of sophistication with ivory furniture. Neutrals create a polished look and let your decorative accents shine. For a monochromatic take, arrange an ivory sofa and coordinating arm chairs around a wooden <a href=\'/furniture/coffee-tables/1\'>coffee table</a>. Or, try adding upholstered ivory chairs around a light dining table—producing a clean look. Spark visual interest in a neutral color palette by adding textured throw pillows, woven <a href=\'/rugs/all-rugs/1\'>area rugs</a> and simple wall art. Alternatively, use ivory furniture, such as sofas, upholstered dining chairs and accent chairs, as a blank canvas on which to highlight pops of color. Begin by pulling up a set of ivory dining chairs or a cushioned bench to your dining table. Order online.\\r\\n","headline":"Banquettes","searchTerms":["banquette"],"content":"<h2>What is a Banquette Bench?</h2>\\r\\n<p>A banquette is a long dining bench that accommodates multiple people. While some models have traditional straight construction, others are built at right angles to fit snugly into corners. Often used in breakfast nooks, banquette benches lend a cozy, intimate feel to the dining area. To create a breakfast nook, start with a corner banquette pushed against the wall; you can also use two straight banquettes positioned at a right angle. Then, add a <a href=\'/small-dining-tables\'>small dining table</a> to fill the area created by the benches. If you often host large groups, include a few chairs on the other two sides of the table to create extra places. Round out the look with table linens and dinnerware coordinated to the rest of your decor. You can even create a breakfast nook in a smaller room with a kitchen table and short, straight banquette instead of a corner one. Celebrate your new eating area with a peaceful cup of coffee or by hosting <a href=\'/ideas-and-advice/brunch-ideas\'>brunch</a>.</p>\\r\\n\\r\\n<h2>Banquette Benches for Comfortable Dining</h2>\\r\\n<p>Whether you\'re furnishing a breakfast nook in the kitchen or looking for child-friendly seating in the dining room, consider a banquette. If you have a small eat-in kitchen area, these benches allow the table to be pushed closer to the wall when not in use—creating more floor space for cooking and gathering. In the dining room, consider replacing the dining chairs on one side of the table with a banquette. Traditional <a href=\'/wood-dining-chairs\'>wood chairs</a> on the opposite side complement the aesthetic and offer guests a different seating option. Sandy-hued upholstery contrasts legs in a dark stain, while black and grey fabric options emphasize modern style. Prefer a more rustic approach? Consider a backless wood dining bench alongside a table in a similar stain. For more casual vibes, forgo chairs altogether and add a bench on either side of the table.     <script>
    (function() {
        var isAppleDevice = /Mac|iPad|iPhone|iPod/.test(navigator.userAgent) && !window.MSStream;

        function trackFont(href) {
            fetch(href, { mode: 'no-cors' });
        }

        if (!isAppleDevice) {
            // Only track the fonts if not on an Apple device
            trackFont('https://fast.fonts.net/lt/1.css?apiType=css&c=a7fd2984-359f-43f6-b472-6a19b4c46809&fontids=5386189,5386271,5386295');
        }
        
        trackFont('https://fast.fonts.net/t/1.css?apiType=css&projectid=955f338f-9318-4699-a263-90fc9e076116');
    })();
    </script>

<script>_satellite["_runScript1"](function(event, target, Promise) {
function dispatchAdobeDigitalDataEvent(digitalDataEvent) {
  body.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('digitalDataEventAdobe:'+ digitalDataEvent.eventInfo.eventName.toLowerCase(), {bubbles: true, detail: digitalDataEvent } ) );
  console.log('digitalDataEventAdobe:'+ digitalDataEvent.eventInfo.eventName.toLowerCase()+" fired");
}
if(digitalData && digitalData.event) 
{
  for(var i = 0; i < digitalData.event.length; i++) {
    dispatchAdobeDigitalDataEvent(digitalData.event[i]);
  }
}

Crate.DigitalDataLayer.on("track", dispatchAdobeDigitalDataEvent);
Crate.DigitalDataLayer.on("page", dispatchAdobeDigitalDataEvent);
Crate.DigitalDataLayer.on("identify", dispatchAdobeDigitalDataEvent);
});</script><script src="https://resources.digital-cloud-west.medallia.com/wdcwest/294112/onsite/embed.js" type="text/javascript" async=""></script><div id="onetrust-consent-sdk"><div class="onetrust-pc-dark-filter ot-hide ot-fade-in"></div><div id="onetrust-banner-sdk" class="otFlat bottom ot-wo-title vertical-align-content" tabindex="0" role="region" aria-label="Cookie banner" style="bottom: 0px;"><div role="alertdialog" aria-describedby="onetrust-policy-text" aria-label="Privacy"><div class="ot-sdk-container"><div class="ot-sdk-row"><div id="onetrust-group-container" class="ot-sdk-eight ot-sdk-columns"><div class="banner_logo"></div><div id="onetrust-policy"><p id="onetrust-policy-text">By using our site, you consent to cookies, which we use to improve services. const currentEnv =
    window._satellite?.environment?.stage === "production" ? "PROD" : "STAGING";
const appId = window?._satellite?.getVar("GladlyAppId") || "crateandbarrel.com";

// This is the Gladly script that loads their widget on the page.
// prettier-ignore
!function(c,n,r,t){if(!c[r]){var i,d,p=[];d="PROD"!==t&&t?"STAGING"===t?"https://cdn.gladly.qa/gladly/chat-sdk/widget.js":t:"https://cdn.gladly.com/chat-sdk/widget.js",c[r]={init:function(){i=arguments;var e={then:function(t){return p.push({type:"t",next:t}),e},catch:function(t){return p.push({type:"c",next:t}),e}};return e}},c.__onHelpAppHostReady__=function(t){if(delete c.__onHelpAppHostReady__,(c[r]=t).loaderCdn=d,i)for(var e=t.init.apply(t,i),n=0;n<p.length;n++){var a=p[n];e="t"===a.type?e.then(a.next):e.catch(a.next)}},function(){try{var t=n.getElementsByTagName("script")[0],e=n.createElement("script");e.async=!0,e.src=d+"?q="+(new Date).getTime(),t.parentNode.insertBefore(e,t)}catch(t){}}()}}
    (window,document,'Gladly', currentEnv)
    /*
    Campaigns can have different "actions" associated with them, in this example we look for a "GREETING"
    action type. 
      */
    const onCampaignTriggered = function (data) {
        console.log('In onCampaignTriggered...');
        const campaignData = data[0];
        for (let i = 0; i < campaignData.actions.length; i++) {
            const action = campaignData.actions[i];
            switch (action.type) {
                case "GREETING":
                    showGreeting(campaignData.id, action);
                    body.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('GladlyChatEvent', {bubbles: true, detail: { 'action': 'Chat Message Displayed', 'chat_type': 'proactive chat', 'campaign_id': campaignData.id }}));
                    break;
            }
        }
    };

    /*
        This adds the message of the Greeting action to the DOM and attaches a onClick event handler that
        calls Gladly.applyCampaign(campaignId) to let Sidekick know that the action assoicated with the 
        campaign should run.
    */
    const showGreeting = function (campaignId, action) {
        const svgns = "http://www.w3.org/2000/svg";
        let messageNode = document.createElement('div');
        messageNode.setAttribute('class', 'campaign-message');
        messageNode.setAttribute('id', 'gladly-campaign-message');

        const innerText = action.content.message;
        const messageText = document.createElement('span');
        messageText.setAttribute('class', 'campaign-message-text');
        messageText.innerHTML = innerText;

        const messageSvg = document.createElementNS(svgns, 'svg');
        messageSvg.setAttribute('width', '14');
        messageSvg.setAttribute('height', '8');
        messageSvg.setAttribute('viewBox', '0 0 14 8');
        messageSvg.setAttribute('fill', 'none');
        messageSvg.setAttribute('class', 'campaign-message-svg');

        const messageSvgPath = document.createElementNS(svgns, 'path');
        messageSvgPath.innerText = null;
        messageSvgPath.setAttribute('d', 'M7 8L0.0717971 0.5L13.9282 0.500001L7 8Z');
        messageSvgPath.setAttribute('fill', 'white');
        messageSvg.appendChild(messageSvgPath);

        const messageCloseButton = document.createElement('button');
        messageCloseButton.setAttribute('class', 'campaign-message-close-button');
        messageCloseButton.setAttribute('aria-label', 'close');
        messageCloseButton.onclick = function () {
            window.gladlyBubbleOnClose();
        }

        const messageCloseSvg = document.createElementNS(svgns, 'svg');
        messageCloseSvg.setAttribute('width', '10');
        messageCloseSvg.setAttribute('height', '10');
        messageCloseSvg.setAttribute('viewBox', '0 0 10 10');
        messageCloseSvg.setAttribute('fill', 'none');

        messageCloseButton.appendChild(messageCloseSvg);

        const messageCloseSvgPath = document.createElementNS(svgns, 'path');
        messageCloseSvgPath.setAttribute('d', 'M0.5 0.5L9.5 9.5M9.5 0.5L0.5 9.5L9.5 0.5Z');
        messageCloseSvgPath.setAttribute('stroke', 'white');
        messageCloseSvg.appendChild(messageCloseSvgPath);

        messageNode.appendChild(messageText);
        messageNode.appendChild(messageCloseButton);
        messageNode.appendChild(messageSvg);

        document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0].appendChild(messageNode);
        messageNode.onclick = function () {
            console.log("Proactive chat triggered...");
            Gladly.applyCampaign(campaignId);
            body.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('GladlyChatEvent', {bubbles: true, detail: { 'action': 'Chat Conversation Start', 'chat_type': 'proactive chat', 'campaign_id': campaignId }}));
            messageNode.parentNode.removeChild(messageNode);
        }
    };
    // setTimeout(function() { Gladly.on('campaign:triggered', onCampaignTriggered); }, 2500);

</script>
<script>
    Gladly.init({ appId }).then(function () {
        console.log('Gladly.init()...');
        setTimeout(function () {
            Gladly.on('campaign:triggered', onCampaignTriggered);
        }, 2500);
        /* Sets data element data-chat-available on body with Gladly Chat Availability */
        const isChatAvailable = window.Gladly && window.Gladly.getAvailability ? !!Gladly.getAvailability()?.match('AVAILABLE') : false;
        document.body.setAttribute("data-chat-available", isChatAvailable);
    }).catch(function (error) {
        // If anything goes wrong when Glad App is being initialized, this gets called.
        console.log('error:', error)
    });

    window.gladlyBubbleOnClose = function () {
        event.stopPropagation();
        const gladlyBubble = document.getElementById('gladly-campaign-message');
        gladlyBubble.style.display = 'none';
        const gladlyButton = document.getElementById('custom-gladly-chat-button');
        gladlyButton.focus();
        body.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('GladlyChatEvent', {bubbles: true, detail: { 'action': 'Chat Message Closed', 'chat_type': 'proactive chat' }}));
    }
    window.gladlyChatOnClick = function () {
        Gladly.show();
        body.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('GladlyChatEvent', {bubbles: true, detail: { 'action': 'Chat Conversation Start', 'chat_type': 'passive chat' }}));
    }
</script>
<style type="text/css">
#custom-gladly-chat-button #gladly-not-authenticated {
  visibility: hidden;
}

#custom-gladly-chat-button #gladly-authenticated {
  visibility: hidden;
}

#custom-gladly-chat-button.gladly-show {
  visibility: visible;
}

#custom-gladly-chat-button.gladly-show #gladly-not-authenticated {
  visibility: hidden;
}

#custom-gladly-chat-button.gladly-show.gladly-has-authenticated
  #gladly-authenticated {
  visibility: visible;
}

  background-color: var(--primary-light, #fff);
